1435220.name: Super Laser Fury
1435220.description:
Feel the white, hot, heat of the arena as you run this time trial bullet hell gauntlet. Scoring points, earning cash, battling up the leaderboard in this future sport. It's time to show the world what you're made of and become the ultimate champion of Super Laser Fury!



Super Laser Fury is an adrenaline-fueled, bullet hell arena game that will test your skills and reflexes to the limit. You'll be dropped into various futuristic arenas, each filled with waves of enemies that are hell-bent on taking you down. But don't worry, with the audience behind you and a laser cannon at your disposal, it’s all going to make for a great show whatever the outcome.

As you progress through the game, you'll earn points for taking out enemies and completing arena runs in the fastest times. The more points you collect, the higher you'll climb up the leaderboard, earning you cash and drawing the attention of sponsors. Sponsorship and cash will give you access to new loadouts and exclusive upgrades, making you even more deadly and efficient and giving you the edge in the arena, moving you one step closer to becoming the ultimate champion.


Development


Currently still in development, Super Laser Fury is a fusion of Smash TV, Running Man and Speedball 2. Drawing on their frenetic bullet hell arcade gameplay style, and the arena based future sports game show feel!

With six arenas, three divisions, and six heats in each, the final game will have plenty of action to keep you engaged for hours on end. And with six different sponsors to level up through, you'll always have something to strive for.
1435220.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
